data.title: The Sound of Southern Utah
data.meta_description: Thunderbird Marching Band at Southern Utah University is interested in musicians hoping to bring pride and joy to SUU Athletic events.
data.text:
The "Sound Machine" is the basketball pep band at Southern Utah University. They attend most home men's and women's games and travel to major tournaments including conference tournaments or NCAA March Madness Tournament.

There is an audition process for this band. To be eligible, members must be a part of the "Sound of Southern Utah" marching band the semester immediately preceding the intended Sound Machine season. Any member of the “Sound of Southern Utah” is welcome to play along with the Sound Machine at any game in which they would like to support the T-Birds!

For more information on the Sound Machine Basketball Bands, please contact davidtorres2@suu.edu.

Thunderbird Independent is our Winter guard at SUU, which performs around the region starting in early January. This group was started in the Fall of 2022 to continue our marching color guard program into the Spring semester. This group intends to become the destination for color guard specialists and enthusiasts in our state and region.

There is an audition process for this group, eligibility requirements are that the auditioning member must be a registered student at SUU during the semester of involvement. Follow SUU Colorguard on Instagram and other Social Media!

For more information on the SUU Independent Winterguard, please contact Allison Weber at colorguard@suu.edu .
